Utils¶

calendar_api¶

class app.calendar_api.calendar_api.CalendarApi[source]¶

This class create the google calenar api for adding event to the calendar

add_event(title, description, attendee, start, duration)[source]¶

Add event to the calendar

Parameters

  • title (str) – title of the event

  • description (str) – description of the event

  • attendee (str) – email of the user

  • start (datetime) – time start event

  • duration (int) – duration of car booked

  • service – the calendar service

Returns

an event object

Return type

Event

authorization()[source]¶

Returns

calendar service

This function delete calendar event

Parameters

event_id (str) – id of deleted event
